name: Indoor Haul
description:
In Indoor Haul, you once again find yourself at an abandoned indoor mall. Using your trusty shopping cart, grab as many valuables as you can - but BEWARE! The heavier your cart gets, the harder it is to push! Try to get a high score in the 2-Minute, 5-Minute, and Free Play modes!leave a comment telling me if they work or not?

Controls

- Move --------- "WASD"
- Sprint --------- "Left Shift"
- Look --------- Mouse Movement
- Interact --------- Left Mouse, or "E"

Music

The background music inside the mall does not belong to me, and can be found here:

  • [BIRDS 夢の中でフライング]
  • [NY3D ニューヨーク警察の緩和]
  • [Late Night Confessions - ImCoPav]

Tools Used

  • Unity
  • iTween
  • Photoshop
  • FL Studio
  • Audacity
  • Blender
  • A Tascam Audio Recorder
  • Self Motivation

 Patch Notes

None Yet!
